Madeleine Michèle Ngono Mani Epse Ongueme (onye bụ onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii nke onwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1983), nke a maara dị ka Madeleine Ngono Mani, bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye n'ebe goolu na-agbachitere Albi Croix na mpaghara nke abụọ nke mba France ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu mba Cameroon, nke ọ gbaarala bọọlụ 2012 Summer Olympics, African Women's Championship, na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup.

Ọrụ ya malitere na otu egwuregwu Lorema FC na Canon Yaoundé, ma merie iko mba nakwa league ugboro abụọ nke ọ bụla na Cameroon. Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma n'obodo gasịrị, ọ sonyeere RC Saint-Étienne n'afọ 2003, mgbe ahụ na ọkwa nke anọ nke bọọlụ French
Ndị otu ahụ jikọtara ya na AS Saint-Étienne n'afọ 2009, mgbe ha dugara ha n'ọkwa kachasị elu nke bọọlụ French, n'ụzọ na adịghị nta n'ihi mgbalị Ngono Mani inye goolu
Ọ sonyeere ASJ Soyaux wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ebute goolu na nke abụọ

Ọ ghọrọ ọkachamara site na isonyere Guingamp n'afọ 2011 mgbe ọ gachara obere oge na FCF Monteux. Ọ kwagara Claix n'afọ 2013 mgbe afọ abụọ ya na Guingamp rụchara ọrụ. N'afọ 2015, ọ gafere na FC Minsk, na usoro ego.
N'afọ 2016, ọ kwagara Aurillac Arpajon, na mpaghara nke abụọ nke France. N'afọ 2018 ọ gbara la ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ Albi Croix bọọlụ

Ọ malitere na World Cup qualifier megide South Africa n'afọ 2002, na mmeri goolu abụọ asatara otu. N'afọ 2012 Summer Olympics na London, United Kingdom, ọ gbara egwuregwu atọ niile nke otu nke asọmpi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị, mana ndị otu ahụ enwetaghị otu akara ma ghara iru eru maka agba na-esote

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mgbasa ozi Cameroon na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup, na-agba isi iji mezue mmeri nloghachi megide Switzerland, yana ịnye goolu ọkpụ isii asataghị̀ otu nke Ecuador. Ọ bụkwa onye kacha nye gọọlụ n'otu mba ahụ.
